Allocates a new buffer from the pool.

Declaration

public T*Allocate(bool fillWithDefault)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Boolean fillWithDefault

If true, fills all the buffers with default (T)
Returns
Type Description
T*

A pointer to the buffer. The pointer is null if the buffer is full

Free(ref T*)

Frees an already allocated buffer from the pool. Does nothing if the buffer is already freed.
